summary.name: Summary
summary.content:
• 8+ years of experience delivering Microsoft 365 Power Platform solutions (Power Apps, Power Pages, Power BI, Power Automate, Dataverse).

  • Designed and delivered Microsoft Copilot Studio solutions to automate onboarding, case triage, and knowledge management.

  • Implemented Microsoft Copilot with Dataverse for federal customer to drive field operations.

  • Architected end-to-end Microsoft 365 and Dynamics 365 CE/CRM integrations with Power Platform and REST APIs.

  • Optimized business processes by embedding Microsoft Copilot agents into apps and portals, reducing manual workloads.

  • Developed scalable solutions using Azure Functions, Azure SQL Database, and custom connectors.

  • Led consulting engagements to capture requirements and translate them into Copilot-enhanced solution architectures.

  • Supported Agile (Scrum/Kanban) delivery models and maintained full SDLC and release management documentation.

  • Applied business process reengineering techniques to streamline workflows and enhance user adoption.

  • Proficient in MS Office Suite, Jira, Bitbucket, and experienced in technical writing and documentation.

  • Passionate about building AI-driven digital workplace solutions that improve employee engagement and customer experiences.

items.summary:
• Designed and delivered enterprise-scale Power Platform solutions for a federal client managing a 100,000+ user Microsoft 365 tenant, enhancing governance and provisioning at scale.

  • Launched 25+ Canvas Apps as part of a self-service portal for M365, Power Platform, and Azure resource requests, reducing support ticket volume by 60%.

  • Automated end-to-end workflows with Power Automate, Azure Functions, and PowerShell, enforcing compliance across 10+ governance policies.

  • Integrated Microsoft Copilot to streamline request handling, provide real-time assistance, and reduce turnaround times by up to 10 business days.

  • Enabled live auditing and reporting of provisioning actions via Dataverse and Power BI, saving 120+ hours/month in manual tracking.

  • Developed Copilot-driven dashboards and reporting tools to support leadership decisions in procurement, operations, and performance management.

  • Authored 24+ technical guides and onboarding materials, improving user adoption and reducing support load.

  • Collaborated with federal stakeholders to align solution architecture with business goals, SDLC processes, and long-term platform strategy.

• Designed and implemented a Power Platform-based contract order system for a federal agency, serving 30,000+ users and handling 100+ submissions monthly.

  • Built a Canvas App integrated with SharePoint to enable catalog browsing, cart building, and checkout, reducing manual processing time by 80%.

  • Enhanced system integration with a SQL-based backend using REST APIs, enabling secure, real-time transaction processing and multi-unit auditability.

  • Architected the solution for scalability, AI-readiness, and future Copilot integration to streamline user assistance and form generation.

  • Applied Agile practices to drive iterative releases and sprint planning with stakeholders, improving delivery speed by 20%.

  • Ensured system reliability with built-in data validations, automated error handling, and SDLC-compliant documentation.

• Designed and delivered a Power Platform solution for Facebookâ€™s Infrastructure division to track obsolescence across 10,000+ data center assets, improving inventory visibility and lifecycle management.

  • Built end-to-end system using Canvas Apps, Dataverse, Power Automate, and SharePoint, reducing manual tracking efforts and accelerating asset status updates.

  • Leveraged Microsoft 365 connectors to automate approvals, notifications, and reporting, cutting administrative overhead by 80%.

  • Partnered with cross-functional stakeholders to align solution design with operational requirements, increasing process efficiency and reducing data discrepancies.

  • Improved reporting and data accuracy for asset management, supporting better procurement and contract decisions across multiple infrastructure teams.

• Delivered Power Platform governance solutions for a federal client, streamlining contract oversight and supporting 100+ monthly transactions across procurement and operations teams.

  • Developed apps with advanced Azure SQL queries to drive interactive reporting in Power BI, accelerating data analysis cycles and enabling leadership to make faster, insight-driven decisions.

  • Automated 20+ data processing workflows using Power Automate and SharePoint, including the conversion of reports into CSV and PDF formats, saving hundreds of staff hours per quarter and improving compliance.

  • Integrated REST APIs to synchronize data between legacy systems and modern Power Platform components, enhancing cross-system accuracy.

  • Supported alignment with SDLC best practices by maintaining version-controlled deployment packages and collaborating with multi-agency teams during iterative releases.
